story_03_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
The place Paulo told us about should be around
here, right?
story_03_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
But yikes, this place is hot!
Are there really Trainers that come
here on purpose?
story_03_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
I guess there actually are people here...
Look over there.
story_03_01000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Is that all you’ve got, Flannery?!
Get back up!
story_03_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Hey, you guys are Trainers right?
Can we ask you a question?
story_03_01000/2401_1001_1000_10: We’re looking for people to join our PML team!
story_03_01000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Oh, the PML!
I see, but...
story_03_01000/2401_1001_1200_10:
I’m training with Blaine here so I can be an
awesome Trainer like my grandpa.
story_03_01000/2401_1001_1300_10:
I’m flattered you’d ask, but I want to focus on
getting stronger right now.
story_03_01000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Aw, man. You’re not gonna compete?
Well...I guess we can’t force you.
story_03_01000/2401_1001_1500_10:
I see you’ve made your way to Pasio
as well, Blaine. Didn’t think I’d see you here.
story_03_01000/2401_1001_1600_10:
Pleasure running into you, too, Brock!
Seems like you’ve got yourself a pretty
strong team here.
story_03_01000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Hmm... I just had a brilliant idea.
See, I’ve been thinking of moving on to
a new training area here pretty soon...
story_03_01000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Sorry to spring this on you guys, but how
would you feel about battling Flannery here?
story_03_01000/2401_0301_1900_10: Sure! Let’s do it right now!
story_03_01000/2401_0401_2000_10:
Whoa, there... Pump the brakes a bit, would ya?
I didn’t mean right this second.
story_03_01000/2401_0302_2100_10: Wait, we’re not ready to battle yet!
story_03_01000/2401_0402_2200_10:
Whoa, there... Pump the brakes a bit!
Don’t worry. I didn’t mean right this second.
story_03_01000/2401_1001_2300_10:
There are a lot of other sync pairs that came here
to train. A lot of hot-blooded ones, just like us.
story_03_01000/2401_1001_2400_10:
How about you battle your way through them and
finally battle Flannery at the top of the volcano?
story_03_01000/2401_1001_2500_10:
Wait... You want me to represent all the other
Trainers here and stand atop the volcano?
As the final Trainer to beat?!
story_03_01000/2401_1001_2600_10: Oh gosh... That sounds like a pretty big role...
story_03_01000/2401_1001_2700_10:
Wait, why am I hesitating?!
Blaine’s entrusting me to represent the volcano
as the strongest Trainer of us all...
story_03_01000/2401_1001_2800_10:
I’ll show you what I’m made of!
Come see me at the top...if you can!
story_03_01000/2401_1001_2900_10:
Well, look at that kid go...
Sorry to put all of this on you kids, but could you
do me a favor and humor her for a bit?
story_03_01000/2401_1001_3000_10:
Don’t worry—we won’t waste your time.
You’re looking for team members, right?
I’m sure you’ll find a few great ones.
story_03_01000/2401_1001_3100_10:
Good deal! Thanks for lookin’ out, old man!
Let’s get to it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
